interface.name: GenericDeclaration
interface.javadoc:
A common interface for all entities that declare type variables.
1.5

Returns an array of {@code TypeVariable} objects that represent the type variables declared by the generic declaration represented by this {@code GenericDeclaration}object, in declaration order. Returns an array of length 0 if the underlying generic declaration declares no type variables.
an array of {@code TypeVariable} objects that represent the type variables declared by this generic declaration
GenericSignatureFormatError if the generic signature of this generic declaration does not conform to the format specified in <cite>The Java™ Virtual Machine Specification</cite>
